title: La Trattativa (2014) [DVD9 - Ita 5.1 - Eng Subs]
description:
La Trattativa

*Thx to the Original Uploader (?)

Original Title: La Trattativa
Country: Italy
Year: 2014
Genres: Documentary
Director: Sabina Guzzanti
Screenplay: Sabina Guzzanti
Photography: Daniele Cipri
Production: SECOL SUPERBO, SCIOCCO PRODUZIONI S.R.L., CINEMA S.R.L.
Distribution: BiM Distribution

Sabina Guzzanti -> Narratrice, prof.sa di teologia, giornalista
Antonino Bruschetta -> Prof. di teologia, pubblico ministero (Ninni Bruschetta)
Enzo Lombardo -> Gaspare
Spatuzza, giudice, barbiere
Sabino Civilleri -> Enzo Scarantino, Massimo Ciancimino giovane
Filippo Luna ->
Massimo Ciancimino, magistrato
Franz Cantalupo -> Vito Ciancimino, poliziotto, magistrato
Nicola Pannelli ->
Colonnello Riccio, magistrato
Michele Franco -> Giancarlo Caselli, massone, magistrato, Enzo Cartotto, agente dei
Servizi
Claudio Castrogiovanni -> Luigi Ilardo, calciatore del Bacigalupo
Sergio Pierattini -> colonnello
Mori
Maurizio Bologna -> Marcello Dell'Utri, magistrato
Jay Natelle -> Mafioso americano

The movie is a story of some episodes in Italian history from the nineties onwards, defined as
negotiations State-mafia. Actors and actresses interpret some figures of the period: the Mafia, the Masons, intelligence
officers, senior officers, judges, politicians, victims and honest people. The questions raised in the movie are many.
